form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, Form 1-427 ( (Rev.1-1-77)N

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 200 World Way, Los Angeles, California 5-24-79 Date: PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS INC. 200 WORLD WAY LOS ANGELES, CA. 90045 YOUR ATTENTION IS DIRECTED TO THE PARAGRAPH CHECKED X BELOW: Attached are copy(ies) of Form I-94 relating to person(s) brought into the United States by your transportation line under section 7 of our Immediate and Continuous Transit Agreement. The Service has received no record of the timely departure of the alien(s). If no evidence is received within 15 days, you will be sent a bill of $500.00 in liquidated damages for each listed alien. THIS BILL WILL BE FINAL UNLESS YOU CAN FURNISH EVIDENCE OF THE DEPARTURE OF THE ALIEN IN CONFORMITY WITH THE AGREEMENT. As indicated in my letter of October 30, 1978 , a bill for liquidated damages of $500.00 for each alien is enclosed since you did not transport the listed alien(s) through and out of the United States within the time set by the admitting immigration officer for departure. A bill for liquidated damages is enclosed for your failure to transport the listed alien(s) through and out of the United States within the time set by the admitting immigration officer for departure. The person(s) named on the attached Form G-251 absconded after being admitted in transit without visa. Liquidated damages in the amount of $500.00 for each alien is being assessed as provided by section 7 of our Immediate and Continuous Transit Agreement. (See attached copy(ies) of Form I-94 for full details of admission.) Sincerely, District Director Attachment(s) LOS 79-372 Form 1-427 (Rev.1-1-77)N
